backend/main.mo: Main actor handling user profiles, app settings, and sermon fetching/caching with access control and HTTP outcalls.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration types and a no-op migration function from old sermon cache state to new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering styling, API hooks, settings, prayer times, weather, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with metadata, Inter font links, app icon, and React root mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering header and mobile tab navigation with all feature tabs.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file for authentication button component.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Mobile tab navigation component using shadcn Tabs with six app sections.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Card prompting users to select a location with icon and navigation callback.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Stylized card component displaying an Esmaül Hüsna item with rotating color themes.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Exports the Esmaül Hüsna item interface and a dataset containing the names, meanings, and prayers.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Renders a grid of Esmaül Hüsna cards and shows detailed info in a dialog when a card is selected.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Provides logic to determine the current prayer slot based on adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Displays location, weather, next prayer countdown, and prayer times, with a dialog for location setup.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Shows the upcoming prayer name, time, and remaining duration using countdown hook logic.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Renders clickable cards for verse, hadith, dua, and esma content and displays full content in a dialog.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Defines a dua item interface and exports a list of Arabic duas with Turkish meanings and occasions.
Defines the HadithItem interface and exports a static list of hadiths with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and sources.
Defines the VerseItem interface and provides a static array of Quran verses with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: A React hook that determines and tracks the current prayer slot, updating once per minute.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: A React hook that computes the next prayer time and remaining time until it, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: Component allowing users to search for and select a location, displaying current selection and geocoding results.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Functions to query the Open-Meteo geocoding API and convert results into internal Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Type definitions for Location and GeocodingResult objects.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that performs debounced geocoding searches through the Open-Meteo API.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: UI for a namaz tutorial tab showing rakat counts and step-by-step prayer instructions for men and women.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Defines interfaces and data for namaz steps and rakat counts, including detailed step-by-step instructions for men and women.
Fetches prayer times from the Aladhan API and maps the response into a normalized PrayerTimes object.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: React component that displays daily prayer times, applies user‑defined offsets, and allows editing of offset settings.
Provides functions to apply minute offsets to individual times or full prayer time objects.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that loads prayer times based on the selected location with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: UI component that displays the latest Friday sermon with loading, error, empty, and refresh states.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Hook that retrieves and refreshes the latest sermon via an actor using React Query and mutation.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Defines the AppSettingsModel interface for persisted app settings, including location and notifications.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Handles loading, migrating, and saving settings in localStorage with versioning and defaults.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Renders settings for time offsets and notification lead times with inputs and save actions.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: Manages app settings with React Query, loading from and saving to local storage with defaults.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather from Open-Meteo and maps weather codes to descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React Query hook that retrieves weather data for a given location with retries and caching.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Displays weather info for the selected location, handling loading, errors, and UI layout.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital counter UI with progress, target settings, and persistence via app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables including light/dark color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for rebuilding the Cuma Hutbesi feature, including requirements, issues, and new feature requests for automated sermon fetching and parsing.
